summary: Makes the slaves of the Falmers in Blackreach non-violent toward the player and others. They will defend themselves, but will not join the Falmer in attacking the player.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that changes the slaves of the Falmer in Blackreach so they don't attack the player anymore. They will defend themselves, but will not join the Falmer in attacking the player.

Install with NMM. Or to install manually, simply place the Non-Violent Blackreach Slaves.esp in the Skyrim/Data folder.
author: zyg0tic
